title: Interpretation of a dream reveals the secret in the dream and its interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream revealing a secret in a dream Inside every person they have secrets that they do not reveal even to their closest relatives, but sometimes someone can reveal them in some way and no one likes to show their secrets or appear to people in a way that they do not like. Therefore, we find many who want to keep their private matters and secrets, and seeing secrets revealed in a dream is one of the visions that has occupied many people, so we will present it to you in the lines of the article. Interpretation of a dream revealing a secret in a dream. Seeing yourself revealing a secret in a dream: The dreamer can see in his dream that he is revealing his secrets. This vision does not bode well. In fact, it can have many connotations, including bad and good. If you see yourself revealing a secret in a dream, this indicates the following: Revealing a secret in a dream means that some things that the dreamer tried to hide will come to light. The dream may indicate that someone shares the dreamer’s fears. Whoever dreams that he is revealing his secret, this means that he If he is righteous, he will reveal a big lie to others. If the dreamer is disabled, this means that he is chasing the mistakes of others. Revealing a secret may indicate the emergence of some disagreements between the dreamer and a loved one. It is a warning to the dreamer to fear God. Seeing the dreamer revealing his wife’s secrets means Problems between the dreamer and his wife, which may lead to divorce. The vision may mean the dreamer’s rebellion. And whoever sees in a dream that he is revealing his friend’s secret, this means that he is betraying him. Intentionally revealing a secret in a dream means that it is in the public interest. But unintentionally, it may indicate betrayal, by God. God Almighty knows best. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing hair pulled in a dream and its consequences. Interpretation of the dream of a single woman’s scandal. A scandal in a dream is for an unmarried woman if she has secrets that she hides from her family or friends. This means that in reality he falls into problems that others need to solve, and the vision can mean that the dreamer is exposed to dangers, and the interpretation of a dream of scandal in the individual indicates the meanings: Seeing a single woman telling her secrets, but hiding them from others in a dream, this in reality means that There is someone waiting for the dreamer and wants to harm her. The vision is a warning to the dreamer about bad friends. To see the dreamer exposing someone or revealing the secrets of others, this means sins and gossip in reality. Or the vision may mean that there are disagreements between the dreamer and one of her friends. Revealing other people’s secrets means that The dreamer deceives others and creates problems for them. See also: Interpretation of a dream of watching television for a single and married woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream of revealing a secret in a married woman’s dream. Revealing secrets in a dream about a married woman has many meanings and connotations, and seeing a married woman revealing secrets to an unmarried woman varies. In its connotations for a married woman, and in the following points we will explain to you its interpretation. A vision of revealing secrets in a dream. A married woman: For a married woman to see in a dream that she is revealing the secrets of others, this means that she will increase gossip and gossip. The vision is a warning against the wrong actions that she is doing that affect her negatively. .Seeing a married woman

title: Interpretation of seeing an intimate relationship in a dream for a single woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing an intimate relationship in a single woman’s dream is a strange dream because it is present in the dreamer’s dream, but it is present and there are not a large number of girls interested in searching for it, especially girls who have such dreams, so through the following article we will explain the consequences of seeing an intimate relationship in a dream about single people and the interpretations. The other task related to the same topic. Seeing an intimate relationship in a single woman’s dream. An unmarried woman who sees an intimate relationship in a dream indicates that the dreamer will find a lot of good in her coming days. The vision also indicates that the dreamer will achieve her goals and aspirations and seeing an intimate relationship in a dream. It is an indication that the divine will change her life and many positive changes will appear in her life. Seeing an intimate relationship in a dream for a single woman indicates that the dreamer will have some important and unique opportunities, so he must invest and make good use of them. Seeing an intimate relationship in a dream For an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin: Seeing a close relationship in a dream for an unmarried woman and awakening her lust in a dream is an indication that the dreamer already lacks this thing in his real life and feels lonely and needs a partner in her life. If an unmarried woman sees in a dream an intimate relationship and through it she can Satisfying her desire, this means that the dreamer will succeed in getting rid of the difficult problems and experiences he was exposed to in the previous period. Seeing a close relationship in an unmarried woman’s dream may indicate that the dreamer is trying not to give in to forbidden actions, avoid committing sins and following desires. Asrar website for dream interpretation It is a website specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just write: A website about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream of a close relationship with a lover for a single woman in a dream. Seeing a close relationship with a lover for a single woman in a dream indicates that the dreamer enjoys a good relationship with Her lover and full of love, affection and happiness between them. If the dreamer’s lover is a good person with good morals and the dreamer sees that she has an intimate relationship with him, then this indicates that her lover will propose to her, and that he is a sincere person in his love for her, but in the event that her lover has bad behaviors, then her vision of a close relationship With him, it indicates that this person is manipulating her feelings and will cause her a scandal, so she must stay away from him. Interpretation of a familiar person touching a single woman in a dream: Psychologists believe that seeing a dream of sexual intercourse in an unmarried woman’s dream is an indication of the oppression and pressure in which the girl lives, and the vision is nothing but Breaking free from this pressure in the dream and communicating with a familiar person in the dream is an indication that the dreamer needs someone to free her from her trapped feelings due to her feeling of loneliness. Perhaps seeing an unmarried woman having an intimate relationship with a well-known person indicates that the dreamer likes to appear and always be the center of attention. others, and that the visionary performs actions to emphasize the qualities that make it famous and popular

title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing rose water in a dream?

preview.html: The Hadout website offers you the interpretation of dreams with rose water through the books of leading scholars who interpret dreams and visions. Al-Nabulsi and Imam Al-Sadiq, and we have also collected for you the complete interpretation of rose water in a dream. Dreams of single, married, and pregnant women, as well as men. If you are interested in knowing what rose water dreams about, just take a look at the article. Why do you dream of rose water for a virtuous woman? The interpretation of rose water in a dream, complete for a virtuous woman, is a vision that shows the coming of happiness and goodness and an indication of a bright future. Seeing rose water for a woman General in a dream is a sign of good luck and the fulfillment of many wishes from the girl who have been fulfilled. Also, for unmarried women, seeing pink water in a complete dream is news of an imminent marriage, which will be with a good man and she will end her life with him. The only woman who saw water Pink water in a full dream is a sign of calm, stability, success, and success in her life. Why does a married woman dream of rose water? The interpretation in a dream full of a woman wiping pink water for a married woman is one of the desired dreams that indicates goodness and kindness. Also, seeing pink water in a dream full With a married woman, it indicates profit and gain with a lot of sustenance and halal money. Drinking rose water in full in a dream testifies to the stability of her life and her sense of comfort and reassurance with her husband and children. Why does a pregnant woman dream of rose water? Seeing rose water for a pregnant woman in full in a dream is desirable and indicates On the stability of her pregnancy and the ease of giving birth to a new baby, God willing. Also, drinking rose water in a dream for a pregnant woman is one of the dreams that indicate nourishment for her child, and God alone knows what is in the womb. Why does a man dream of rose water? A man’s vision of rose water in a dream in full is one of the visions. Which indicates kindness, support, good deeds, and sincerity in speech. Also, drinking whole rose water in a dream for a sick person is an excellent indication that he will soon recover and improve his health. Seeing rose water in a dream filled with an unmarried young man speaks of his imminent engagement and marriage to a fair and chaste woman. Why do you dream of rose water for a virtuous woman? Drinking rose water in a dream is an ideal sign for a virtuous woman, and a sign of purity from sins and closeness to God Almighty. The distribution of water has been completed in the dream. Seeing an adult in a dream distributing rose water to himself is one of the visions that indicate the closeness of... Joys and happiness in the life of that person and his family. Moreover, seeing a full distribution of water in a dream indicates the good and great support that the dreamer will receive from his trade and business and indicates a promotion and high status. A dream of a full bottle of water for a common woman. Carrying a full bottle of rose water in A dream means goodness, happiness and blessings in one’s future life as well as success and success in studies and work. title: Interpretation of seeing black tar in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a black step in a dream through the website Vision roy2a.com. Seeing black tuna in a dream has many meanings. Seeing it can be a good sign or an evil omen. Interpreters differed in the interpretation of seeing black tar in a dream, depending on the condition of the person who sees it. And his circumstances, whether he is single or a woman, married or pregnant. Today, through the vision website, we will discuss the interpretation of seeing a black step in a dream in detail, based on the opinion of major translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, al-Nabulsi, and Imam al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing black bitumen in a dream? Seeing the color black in a dream It indicates many Bad people in the dreamer’s life who always try to deceive him and lie to him. Seeing the black color on the clothes in a dream indicates that the viewer is going through a difficult time full of sadness and unhappiness. Seeing a black step on the body in a dream indicates many problems and obstacles that the dreamer is going through during this period. Seeing the color Black on the hand in a dream. It indicates that the viewer is getting money that is not his share. See also: Interpretation of seeing gum in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a black flower in Al-Osaimi’s dream? I see in my dream a black layer coming out of my mouth. It indicates the end of the difficulties that the visionary was going through in the dream. His life. Seeing in a dream that you are putting a black layer on the ground to make a road indicates that many positive changes will occur in the fortuneteller’s life. See also: Interpretation of seeing a shower or black ash in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing black tar in a single woman’s dream? Seeing an unmarried woman putting black tar On her face in a dreamIt indicates many worries and sorrows in her life at this time. Seeing an unmarried woman with black asphalt coming out of her mouth in a dream refers to the decline of her anxiety and remove her anxiety next time. Seeing uniform black asphalt in a dream shows that he will get a lot of money soon. What is the interpretation of seeing black tar in a dream for a married woman? Seeing a married woman with black tar in a dream indicates many disagreements and problems in her life because of her husband and children. Seeing a married woman paving the road with black asphalt in a dream indicates that she will get rid of all her problems in the coming period, causing... Seeing a married woman eating black tar in a dream shows that I will face serious health problems in the next few days. Seeing a married woman walking on a black field in a dream shows that she is following wrong paths in her life. See also: Interpretation of seeing a black snake in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing Black tar in a dream for a pregnant woman? Seeing black tar for a pregnant woman in a dream shows that she thinks a lot about the birth process and what will happen to her. Seeing a pregnant woman eating black tar in a dream declared that she is going through a tiring pregnancy and feels severe pain with it. The interpretation of seeing black tar in a dream is that it eats Asphalt indicates that the dreamer will achieve goals

title: Interpretation of the wedding in a dream: Seeing the groom and the bride in a dream

preview.html: Contents: Seeing the bride in a girl’s dream for married people and pregnant women at home Watching a wedding without a groom in a dream and listening to comedy and dancing on the honeymoon. Interpretation of a wedding in a dream If the wedding is with music, playing, dancing, or song, a person will die at the wedding venue, and whoever sees He is preparing for the wedding, and if he sees the bride, then he knows that he will accept it, and if he does not see, then this indicates death. Whoever sees the bride alone in a dream without a funeral, then this bride will be accepted in this world and will have a new life. And whoever sees in a dream marriage in calm, dignity and silence, and there is no pleasure in it, then this It indicates blessing and goodness. And whoever sees in a dream a wedding party, and the guests are wearing bright and cheerful clothes, this is evidence of the joy and happiness that will overwhelm her. And whoever sees in a dream that he married a relative of his enters the land of the Sanctuary. And whoever was a child and saw that she got married and became like a bride giving birth to a son, and whoever has intercourse with her With a happy and smiling groom, he loves life, and whoever sees his marriage in a dream to lust, this means a fair contract with God, or a promotion to a good position. Whoever sees a wedding in a dream, the wedding is interpreted as something unpleasant, and the possibility of something bad happening to someone. Members of his family, or a friend, and it could be death. And whoever sees a wedding with singers and musicians, someone will die at the wedding venue. And whoever dreams that he is a groom and does not know the bride and does not see her, he will die, and if he sees her they describe her to him and people will be upon him. And whoever sees a bride snoring and dancing, It is a calamity coming, and whoever holds the wedding will be a disaster for him, and whoever dreams that he holds the wedding, some of his family will rise. Performing his funeral. Whoever dreams that the wedding is in a house where there is a sick person, this indicates his death. Whoever dreams of a wedding and the guests are wearing dark black clothes, this indicates the grief and grief that awaits her. Whoever dreams of something bad happening in the marriage, this means that illness, death, or calamity. And whoever weeps. In a dream on her wedding night, the interpretation is that she is in great distress and misguidance. Interpretation of the bride in a dream: If she is beautiful, it is a fertile world, and whoever dreams that she is a bride, this is a sign of a short experience or a passing crisis. Interpretation of the groom in a dream: Seeing the groom in a dream means accompanying a cunning and deceitful man. Or losing something of value, or trying to commit a crime. Interpretation of the bride’s family in a dream. Seeing the groom’s or bride’s family in a dream means that there are people who want to help you and may provide you with material or moral assistance. Interpretation of the bride and groom’s dress in a dream. Seeing a white wedding dress indicates the presence of problems with the husband. And singleness, which indicates fleeting concerns like a summer cloud. If you see that you are wearing a wedding dress in a dream, this symbolizes the presence of a personal relationship in your life that you are trying to evaluate and know the direction in which it is heading, that is, in short, wearing a wedding dress or a wedding dress in a dream means the direction to settle An important relationship in your life. If you are wearing a wedding dress or a wedding dress in a dream at the wrong time and place, it means that you feel that you are in a place or place in your life that is not completely suitable for you, or that you are in a relationship that is not suitable for you. A

title: The dream of a married woman who gets married without her husband

preview.html: Dreaming of a married woman marrying someone other than her husband, all marriages are in a dream. If one sees a wet dream, he must have a difficult dream. This is not a vision. If a man sees that he will marry a famous woman, this indicates a new job and promotion, achieving happiness and eliminating family problems. Seeing a woman who married a man other than her husband, and witnessing marriage and getting married in a dream are things that indicate kindness, happiness, an increase in money, prosperity, and happy news, especially if he The groom is a young man or a girl. Achieving the goal, but what is the goal? title: Interpretation of a dream to see that I am in front of people in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of dreams of seeing me in front of people praying in a dream raised many people’s questions about the interpretation of the dreams they see, which became the phenomenon of searching for the meaning of the dream they see in the dream, which prompted them to search seriously through Google search engines and through social networking sites for the true interpretation. For the dream, and we will discuss identifying one of these dreams and its interpretation, which is the interpretation of the dream in which they see that I am the imam praying with the people in a dream and the person seeing that he has become an imam indicates a distinguished position and a distinguished position in society that shows religiosity and good morals. The meaning of the dream is to see that I am in front of the people. The dream of seeing someone indicates Praying in a dream indicates that he will become the master of his people and his family. A dream about praying with a crowd indicates a great responsibility. Men and women praying is a sign of fair trial and reconciliation between men. A dream that I see that I am an imam in prayer with people in the mosque - seeing a person sleeping as if he is praying in the mosque without... To sit, ignoring the word, which indicates that it is unacceptable behavior, and in many cases he must obey, beg and seek forgiveness. Seeing prayer on the roof of the mosque in a dream indicates that this person is known for God’s kindness to others, management of others, and his duties and responsibilities. A dream to see that I am in front of others. People who pray in the church. Whoever sees that he is an imam in a dream, this indicates that he can achieve his dreams and achieve his goals, and God knows best. One of the best visions in a dream about prayer is watching the prayer in the Holy Kaaba, as it portends a decent life, health, wealth, and many goodness and blessings. To dream of the evening prayer in The Kaaba indicates influence, prestige, and power. Dreaming about worshiping the Kaaba indicates that a person’s status is very good, whether in this world or the hereafter, and that he is closer to God Almighty and that his affairs are high in his family and society. I dream of seeing myself in front of people in a dream, the meaning of the Imam’s high status and distinguished social position. If A man saw himself leading women, this indicates that he is responsible for the weak. Seeing a man praying while sitting indicates a lack of worship. Seeing someone praying in the Kaaba indicates the deterioration of his life, his stress, and his pain. Seeing a person leading people while they were standing while they were sitting indicates that they wronged him and took His right. I dreamed that I was praying with a group in the mosque. Congregational prayer in the mosque indicates repentance from sin. Church prayer indicates responsibility and freedom from problems. Seeing that I am in front of people in a dream. Seeing someone praying with people means that you assume a high position. Seeing someone with the highest rank or leader Praying for people indicates his resignation from his position. Whoever prays and cannot read well declares his life faltering. Interpretation of a dream of a man standing in front of a woman. Seeing a man leading a woman shows his leadership over the weak. Seeing a woman leading religion. If a woman sees that she is leading men, this indicates her death. Seeing someone praying with people in a dream. If a person sees himself in a dream praying with women, this indicates that he takes care of the affairs of the weak.... If the same person dreams that people have made him an imam, this indicates that

title: Interpretation of a dream about washing the Kaaba from the inside

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the honorable Kaaba being washed from the inside in a dream. Washing the honorable and trusted Kaaba is an honor that can only be achieved by a few people who had sufficient satisfaction with God and good luck that allowed them to have such a reliable wife. Washing it in a dream indicates that the dreamer wants to get rid of his sins and that he is close to God Almighty and maintains worship and the desire to get closer to God, so in this article we will learn together about the interpretation of her vision. Washing the Kaaba from the inside in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Kaaba in a dream for a single girl. When the dreamer sees the Kaaba in a dream and she is an unmarried girl, this may mean that the dreamer will achieve everything he wants. It may also indicate that the dreamer will respond to her prayers. When the dreamer sees the Kaaba in an unmarried girl’s dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will marry a scholar or jurist. It may also indicate that the dreamer will be an honorable woman. When the dreamer sees the Kaaba in a dream and she is an unmarried girl, this may indicate acceptance of the dreamer if she speaks among people. It may indicate that the dreamer will be a woman whose qualities people know is honesty. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Kaaba in a dream for a married woman: When the dreamer sees the Kaaba in a dream and she is a married woman, this may indicate that the dreamer will achieve what he wants. It can also indicate that the dreamer will succeed in his life. • When the dreamer sees the Kaaba in a dream as a married woman, this may indicate that the dreamer will obtain a new job opportunity. It may also indicate that the dreamer will have a great source of livelihood. • When the dreamer sees the Kaaba in a dream and she is married, this may indicate that the dreamer will become pregnant soon. It may also indicate that the dreamer will hear happy news. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Kaaba in a dream for a pregnant woman: When the dreamer sees the Kaaba in a dream during pregnancy, this may indicate that the dreamer will achieve goodness for her. It may also indicate that the dreamer will give birth to a baby girl. When the dreamer sees the Kaaba in a dream during pregnancy, this may indicate that the dreamer will give birth to a child who will do good for her. It may also indicate that the birth of the dreamer is easy. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Kaaba in a dream for a man: When the dreamer sees himself entering the Holy Kaaba in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will return to his senses while he is ignorant. Also, when the dreamer sees himself entering the Holy Kaaba in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will obey his parents in their lives. When the dreamer sees himself entering the Holy Kaaba in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will get married if he is still... bachelor. Also, when the dreamer sees himself entering the Kaaba in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will not die except in Mecca if the dreamer is sick while awake. • When the dreamer sees himself entering the Holy Kaaba in a dream, this may indicate

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing bamboo in a dream in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a bamboo plant in a dream. There are many plants that exist in nature, whether for decorative purposes, to brighten the atmosphere, or to be fruit plants, living organisms on the face of the Earth. Seeing a plant in a dream brings the dreamer good. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a bamboo plant in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a bamboo plant in a dream. By Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a bamboo plant in a dream as meaning that the dreamer does not depend on himself and that he depends on others for many matters in his life. The vision may indicate that the dreamer is not serious about making fateful decisions and what that indicates. Dreaming of a bamboo plant in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin Sirin as follows: Seeing one cutting bamboo in a dream is a sign that the dreamer may feel failure and failure to complete things in the coming period. While in the case of seeing bamboo growing in a dream, this is good for the dreamer. Planting bamboo in a dream It means that the dreamer will acquire great wealth. If the dreamer sees in a dream that a bamboo plant is growing, this is one of the things that shows that the dreamer is wise. A bamboo stalk in a dream is one of the dreams that indicate kindness, abundant food for the pioneer, and success in various aspects of his life. See also :Interpretation of a dream about white mice in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail. Interpretation of a single woman’s dream of a bamboo stick. If an unmarried woman sees a bamboo plant in her dream, this means that she will soon marry a man of high esteem, who will be wise and intelligent, and she will be happy with him. Seeing a bamboo stick in a woman’s dream An unmarried woman brings good news to him. Whereas if an unmarried woman sees herself walking down the street with a bamboo stick in her hand, this is one of the dreams that means that the dreamer feels empty. Also, a single woman leaning on a stick in a dream means that she needs to feel safe and needs Support. A bamboo plant in an unmarried woman’s dream can mean that she is desperate and hopeless. It may mean that the dreamer needs support to achieve her ambitions and overcome obstacles in her life. Also, an unmarried woman who dreams of a stick in a dream, but without holding it, means that she will be able To plan her life well. Commentators say that the bamboo plant means that the dreamer will reach his goals and achieve his ambitions soon. Seeing a stick turning into a snake in an unmarried woman’s dream is undesirable. Seeing a stick turning into a snake in a virgin’s dream means that there is someone who wants Destroying her life. A stick turning into a snake in an unmarried woman’s dream is a warning about new people in her life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding a child in a dream by Ibn Sirin and its consequences. Bamboo in a dream for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman needs psychological support during pregnancy, and she also needs someone to comfort her From the anxiety that she feels from the fear of childbirth and the fear of her fetus, there are some dreams that come to reassure the dreamer, and between dreams. It is a vision of bamboo. Bamboo in a pregnant woman’s dream is one of the signs that indicate that the dreamer will experience the pregnancy period easily.

title: Interpretation of shooting the moon in a dream in detail

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing the moon in a dream is considered one of the most important topics that attracts a lot of attention, as dreaming about the moon is ambiguous and unclear, but these visions are interpreted according to the state in which the moon was, in addition to the state of the dreamer, and in this article in the encyclopedia we will show you the most important Interpretations of seeing the moon in a dream from the point of view of dream interpretation scholars. Interpretation of projecting the moon in a dream in detail. Interpretation of the moon in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that the moon in a dream generally symbolizes a teacher, a leader, a good boy with his family, or an increase in livelihood. If one sees it in a dream If he holds the moon in his hands, the dream indicates that he will get married in the same year. Whoever sees that the moon has disappeared indicates his salvation from his worries and sorrows, and it may lead to the death of the dreamer. Seeing the full moon shows the holder of a position or ruler, and if one sees his face in it, then this It means that something will happen to the dreamer, and if his face is beautiful, then the matter is good, and if he is ugly, then the matter is bad. Seeing a person hanging from the moon and clinging to it indicates an abundance of money and a lot of goodness on the way to the dreamer. Whoever dreams of the moon becoming a sun, this means That there is goodness coming for him from his wife’s side. The moon running in a dream among the planets and stars in the sky is an indication of the dreamer’s upcoming trip or marriage. Whoever dreams of bowing to the moon is a warning not to commit a great sin or disobedience. If one sees the moon in his bedroom, His dream indicates that he will get married soon. Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of the moon in a dream Ibn Shaheen says that if a single man sees the moon in his dream, this means that he will propose to a beautiful girl who will be a good wife for him. If the dreamer gets married and sees the moon, this means that God will give him a son in the future. Nearby. Seeing the brightness of the moon and the dreamer’s face projecting onto it indicates that he will have a high status in his society. Interpretation of a dream of a single woman on the moonThe moon in a person’s dream indicates optimism and happiness and also shows feelings. It is an auspicious dream for a single woman to see the moon when it is full, because that means That there will be happiness and joy for her in the coming days. If an unmarried woman sees the moon incomplete, this is a sign that there are fears and sorrows that will disturb her. Whoever sees the moon in the shape of a crescent, her dream indicates that she will begin a new phase in her life and that food and goodness will come to her Seeing the brightness of the moon indicates that something very important will happen in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of a married woman’s vision of the moon: In general, the moon in a married woman’s dream symbolizes her husband. If the moon is bright and bright, it means that her husband is financially capable, and if it is dim and not bright, it means that he is going through financial problems. Seeing the paleness or disappearance of the moon in a married woman’s dream indicates the absence of feelings of love and intimate relationship between her and her husband. Interpretation of a woman’s dream Pregnant with the MoonBasically, the moon in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that she will give birth to a boy. If a pregnant woman dreams of the moon when the moon is full, then
